scripts.deploy: zip -r -X ../imageResizer.zip * && cd .. && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name carpedalan --zip-file fileb://imageResizer.zip --profile carpedalan
scripts.stage: zip -r -X ../imageResizer.zip * && cd .. && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name carpedev --zip-file fileb://imageResizer.zip --profile carpedev
